LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_TopWarning: Changing these options will require restarting the game to apply. Some changes may not apply to pawns that have already spawned.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_BottomWarning: Don't see the options you chose? Restart your game!
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_MinimizeOverlapDesc: Selecting this will attempt to minimize the overlap of the Battle Ready gene. This will prevent pawns with the Brawler trait from getting genes that would give them Trigger Happy or Careful Shooter, and vice versa.\n\nEnabling this option will make pawns with this gene slightly more optimized, so disable if you find them OP.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_EnableDrawbacksDesc: This will give pawns a chance to spawn with a drawback trait to balance out the benefits of the Battle Ready gene. Drawback traits include Greedy, Neurotic, Psychopath, and Pyromaniac.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_DrawbackChanceDesc: Chance for a pawn to spawn with a drawback gene. The higher the number, the more likely they are to spawn with a drawback gene. The default is 10%.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_DisablePyromaniaDesc: This will remove Pyromaniac from the drawback gene list, for those who find it too troublesome to deal with.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREHussar_OptionalHornsDesc: This will give uhlans the Mini Horns gene, reinforcing their fiendish appearance.
